R

read(byte[], int, int) - Method in class lejos.nxt.addon.NXTBee
Read bytes directly from the NXTBee RS485 buffer to get data if available Bypasses the internal circular buffer.
receiveMessage() - Method in class irobots.comm.CommunicationManager
Receives a message from another robot and processes the received message.

Processes a pos message.
resetNXTBee() - Method in class lejos.nxt.addon.NXTBee
Reset the NXTBee to the default configuration See the NXTBee documentation for more details.
Robot - Class in irobots.comm
This class contains information about a robot, like position, heading, and where it is moving.
